translation.fr: Pour l'instant, nous n'avonsqu'une femme décédée de 90 ans

translation.en: -You don’t know that. -No, we don’t.

translation.en: Which is why we’ll be waiting for a full autopsy, ma’am.

translation.en: Shouldn’t take any more than a couple of days.

translation.en: So, of course,

translation.fr: - Je vous en prie.- Je vous l'ai dit,

translation.en: The point, gentlemen, is this.

translation.en: uh, approximately 11:00 and two o'clock in the morning
translation.fr: environ 23h00et 2 h du matin.

translation.en: that someone broke in and murdered my wife.

translation.en: Mr. Mott, there was no evidence of any break-in.

translation.en: -I don’t understand. -No, you clearly don’t.

translation.en: Frankly, I can’t believe I have to spell this out for you.
translation.fr: C’est incroyable.Il faut que ce soit moi qui vous explique

translation.en: [sighs] That the sort of people capable of committing this crime

translation.en: would be far too sophisticated to leave convenient clues
translation.fr: seraient bien trop intelligentspour laisser des indices pertinents

translation.en: Mr. Mott, do you know what this is?

translation.en: -It is a criminal complaint. -[Grant] That’s right.
translation.fr: C’est une plainte au pénal. Absolument.

translation.en: A complaint your wife filed against you for assault.
translation.fr: Une plainte que votre femmea déposée contre vous pour agression.

translation.en: Is there anything you’d like to tell us about this?
translation.fr: Voulez-vous nous en parler ?

translation.en: This refers to an incident that occurred in New York City some time ago.
translation.fr: C’est en lien avec un incidentà New York il y a un moment.

translation.en: That there was an argument between my wife and I.
translation.fr: Ma femme et moinous sommes disputés.

translation.en: That, while deeply painful and embarrassing,
translation.fr: Bien que cela soittrès douloureux et gênant,

translation.en: it was not atypical of the sorts of dispute
translation.fr: il n’est pas rareque ce genre de dispute

translation.en: that arise between passionate and long-married people.
translation.fr: arrive entre gens passionnéset mariés depuis longtemps.

translation.en: That it precipitated a break in our marriage,
translation.fr: Cela a provoqué une rupturede notre couple marié.

translation.en: that was mended to our great mutual happiness
translation.fr: Mais nous avons surmonté cela,à notre grande joie mutuelle,

translation.en: after two very difficult years apart.
translation.fr: après deux ans très difficiles.

translation.en: Well…
translation.fr: Donc…

translation.en: given this history and given the fact there was no evidence of any intruder…
translation.fr: Vu ça et le fait qu’il n’y avait aucunepreuve de présence d’un intrus…

translation.en: We’re declaring this a homicide investigation.
translation.fr: nous déclenchonsune enquête pour homicide.

translation.en: Ah. I see.

translation.fr: Mais nous avons obtenu un mandatpour mettre votre maison sous scellés.

translation.en: -pending further forensic investigation. -[Koteras] You can’t go back there.
translation.fr: - En attendant les résultats du légiste.- Vous ne pouvez pas y retourner.

translation.fr: Et nous vous ordonnonsde ne pas quitter Washington.

translation.fr: C’est Ulrich Mott.On peut se voir ? C’est urgent.

translation.en: [David] Mr. Mott.
translation.fr: M. Mott.

translation.fr: Nous avons entendu la nouvelle pour Elsa.

translation.fr: Elle lui a légué 250 000 $. Plus 50 000 si son patrimoine disponibledépasse 600 000 $.

translation.fr: Plus 50 000 si son patrimoine disponibledépasse 600 000 $.

translation.fr: qui doit valoir… près d’un million.

translation.fr: - Probablement plus.- Et il hérite de ça aussi ?

translation.en: -What? -He sounds so far away.

translation.en: Iraq?
translation.fr: En Irak ?

translation.fr: Je revis ce jour à New Yorkdans ma tête, en boucle

translation.en: I’ve been on watch at Mookie’s camp all night

translation.en: and it gets very cold in the desert at night.

translation.en: The chill creeps into your bones and the doubt.

translation.en: And I was wondering what it was all for.

translation.en: Whether there was any real purpose for my being here at all.

translation.en: And then I heard the music.

translation.en: Mookie had found, God knows how,

translation.en: a recording of a Prussian military march and played it over the camp loudspeaker.
translation.fr: une marche militaire prussienneet l'a jouée sur le haut-parleur du camp.

translation.en: And I have no idea how he knew that I loved that music from childhood,
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas comment il a su quej'adorais cette marche depuis l'enfance,

translation.en: let alone how he found a recording.

translation.en: Then the men formed up… and paid a tribute to me.

translation.en: Come in.

translation.en: [Ulrich] Sorry. I was just picking up the mail. One second.

translation.en: Oh, okay. That’s better.

translation.en: [paramedic] Yeah. Right over there.

translation.en: That way. Inside there.

translation.en: I’m not guilty of the murder of my wife Elsa Breht.

translation.en: [judge] It was my understanding

translation.en: uh, Mr. Mott has refused to communicate with either me or my colleague

translation.en: for several weeks now, so we’re unable to proceed.

translation.en: He’s in a weakened condition and has since been moved to a hospital.

translation.en: W--we’re therefore submitting a motion to have him declared unfit for trial.

translation.en: Well, the court will have to make a determination about that.

translation.en: [Volker] Of course.
